pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhantā sūpaññeva bahuṃ paṭiggaṇhanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:8.4: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaññeva bahuṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
